name: California Sport Aviation
about: California Sport Aviation Center, located at the Carson City Airport in Nevada, is a comprehensive flight training school and Fixed Based Operation (FBO). We serve the Reno, Lake Tahoe, and Carson City regions, leveraging Nevada's excellent climate with over 360 days of good flying weather annually. Our mission is to provide top-notch training in light-sport aircraft (LSA) and weight-shift control trikes (WSC). With experienced instructors and a focus on safety, we offer personalized training programs that allow students to complete their flight training efficiently. Our ideal location ensures minimal wait times for takeoffs, making your training experience both effective and enjoyable. At California Sport Aviation Center, we are committed to delivering the best in aviation education.
